PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04012023-05-04AAFC
ActAgricultural Marketing Programs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (2023)
PrecisRegulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program to $350,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2023 program year.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0080 Publication Date: 2023-05-24
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (2023)
precis: Regulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program to $350,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2023 program year.
